name: Prompt Forge V3 Patreon Launch
description: Patreon release campaign for Prompt Forge v3 AI shot list tool

2026-02-10.x:
New tool dropping on Patreon soon.

Prompt Forge v3 turns your scripts into shot lists automatically. No more manual breakdowns.

I've been using the beta for 3 months. It's saved me probably 20 hours on the last video alone.

Link coming. #PromptForge #FILM426
2026-02-10.ig:
New tool dropping on Patreon soon.

Prompt Forge v3 turns your scripts into shot lists automatically.

I've been using the beta for 3 months. It's saved me probably 20 hours on the last video alone.

Link in bio. #PromptForge #FILM426

video.image_description: Mysterious, dark visual with glowing cyan accents, hinting at advanced AI.
video.script: New tool dropping on Patreon soon. Prompt Forge v3 turns your scripts into shot lists automatically. I've been using the beta for 3 months. It's saved me probably 20 hours on the last video alone. Link in bio. #PromptForge #FILM426

2026-02-11.x:
6 months of building Prompt Forge v3:

Started as a spreadsheet. Now it parses scripts, breaks them into shots, and exports directly to ComfyUI.

The UI still needs work (I'm not a designer) but the core functionality is solid.

Launching this week. #PromptForge
2026-02-11.ig:
6 months of building Prompt Forge v3:

Started as a spreadsheet. Now it parses scripts, breaks them into shots, and exports directly to ComfyUI.

The UI still needs work (I'm not a designer) but the core functionality is solid.

Launching this week. #PromptForge

video.image_description: Montage of code snippets, UI elements, and perhaps some abstract AI visualizations, all in dark mode with cyan highlights.
video.script: 6 months of building Prompt Forge v3. Started as a spreadsheet. Now it parses scripts, breaks them into shots, and exports directly to ComfyUI. The UI still needs work - I'm not a designer - but the core functionality is solid. Launching this week. #PromptForge

2026-02-12.x:
Prompt Forge v3 is live on Patreon.

Paste in a script. Get a shot list. Export to ComfyUI.

That's it. That's the tool.

Link in bio. #PromptForge #FILM426

2026-02-14.x:
Honest question: which feature do you actually use?

I thought the script parser would be the big hit, but most of you are using the ComfyUI export. Didn't see that coming.

What are you building with it? #PromptForge

2026-02-16.x:
Quick poll:

What's your biggest time sink when planning a video?

A) Breaking down the script into shots
B) Figuring out camera angles
C) Setting up the ComfyUI workflow
D) Something else (tell me)

#PromptForge #FILM426

name: Clockwork God Album Launch
description: Victorian detective hired to find a loved one, discovers rich factory owners in a cult building a clockwork god in the catacombs. Sherlock Holmes meets Hot Fuzz.

2026-02-17.x:
Clockwork God. February 24th.

A detective takes a missing persons case. The trail leads to a cult of factory owners building something mechanical in the catacombs beneath the city.

It's Sherlock Holmes if Sherlock stumbled into Hot Fuzz. With more gears.

First track at midnight. #ClockworkGod #FILM426
2026-02-17.ig:
Clockwork God. February 24th.

A detective takes a missing persons case. The trail leads to a cult of factory owners building something mechanical in the catacombs beneath the city.

It's Sherlock Holmes if Sherlock stumbled into Hot Fuzz. With more gears.

First track at midnight. #ClockworkGod #FILM426

video.image_description: Abstract mechanical gears turning, glowing cyan accents, vintage clockwork textures.
video.script: Clockwork God. February 24th. A detective takes a missing persons case. The trail leads to a cult of factory owners building something mechanical in the catacombs beneath the city. It's Sherlock Holmes if Sherlock stumbled into Hot Fuzz. With more gears. First track at midnight. #ClockworkGod #FILM426

2026-02-18.x:
Clockwork God took 4 months. Most of that was getting the brass samples to sound right - everything else sounded too clean.

The track 'Gears of London' has 47 layers. My laptop hated me.

Out Friday. #ClockworkGod
2026-02-18.ig:
Clockwork God took 4 months. Most of that was getting the brass samples to sound right - everything else sounded too clean.

The track 'Gears of London' has 47 layers. My laptop hated me.

Out Friday. #ClockworkGod

video.image_description: Studio session footage, synth knobs turning, waveform displays, FL Studio interface.
video.script: Clockwork God took 4 months. Most of that was getting the brass samples to sound right - everything else sounded too clean. The track 'Gears of London' has 47 layers. My laptop hated me. Out Friday. #ClockworkGod

2026-02-19.x:
Clockwork God drops tomorrow.

9 tracks about a detective who uncovers a conspiracy stranger than he bargained for.

If you like your mysteries with mechanical gods and questionable Victorian ethics, this one's for you.

Midnight release. #ClockworkGod #FILM426

Clockwork God drops tomorrow.

video.image_description: Clock face spinning backwards, gears interlacing, album title reveal with release date.
video.script: Clockwork God drops tomorrow. 9 tracks about a detective who uncovers a conspiracy stranger than he bargained for. If you like your mysteries with mechanical gods and questionable Victorian ethics, this one's for you. Midnight release. #ClockworkGod #FILM426

2026-02-21.x:
24 hours of Clockwork God.

The track 'Brass and Bone' is getting more plays than I expected. Didn't think the instrumental would hit that hard.

What's your pick so far? #ClockworkGod

2026-02-22.x:
Weekend listening:

Clockwork God is 37 minutes of Victorian conspiracy with a synth soundtrack.

Good for late-night coding sessions or pretending you're solving mysteries in foggy London.

Link in bio. #ClockworkGod

2026-02-23.x:
Clockwork God poll:

Which side of the album do you prefer?

A) Side A - The mystery builds
B) Side B - The cult and the god

I'm biased toward side B but curious what you think. #ClockworkGod
2026-02-23.ig:
Clockwork God poll:
